price: Yemwe abemeye! Mu by’ukuri, (igihe muri mu migenzo y’umutambagiro mutagatifu wa Hija cyangwa Umrat), Allah azabagerageresha (kubegereza) umuhigo mushobora gufatisha amaboko yanyu n’uwo mwakwicisha amacumu yanyu, kugira ngo Allah agaragaze umutinya atamubona. Ubwo uzarengera nyuma y’ibyo (agahiga ari mu migenzo y’umutambagiro mutagatifu wa Hija cyangwa Umrat), azahanishwa ibihano bibabaza.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَيَبۡلُوَنَّكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِشَيۡءٖ مِّنَ ٱلصَّيۡدِ تَنَالُهُۥٓ أَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَرِمَاحُكُمۡ لِيَعۡلَمَ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَخَافُهُۥ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۚ فَمَنِ ٱعۡتَدَىٰ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَلَهُۥ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū layabluwannakumu al-lahu bishayin mina al-ṣaydi tanāluhu aydīkum warimāḥukum liyaʿlama al-lahu man yakhāfuhu bil-ghaybi famani iʿ'tadā baʿda dhālika falahu ʿadhābun alīmun
